729129f-a.title: Richmond: Martling Avenue - Slosson Avenue
729129f-a.text:
Martling Avenue, south side, 400 feet west of Slosson Avenue. Beers's 1874 map shows the house to be on the A. B. Martling property. It later became part of the Luoy P. Smith estate.
July 2, 1929
P. L. Sperr
729129f-a.folder: Martling Avenue & Slosson Avenue, Staten Island, NY
